OOC:  I might be wrong, but I'm pretty sure that  the difference is that, a=
n android is  part organic, but is  truely techno.  And a cyborg, is part t=
echno, but truely organic.  These are usually used for part-techno, part-hu=
man.  But in transformers case, most would be "androids", because  they are=
 originally techno  but take on some organic.  But for transformers, wouldn=
't they be called "techno-organic"?
